Trade/Device Name(s): CONTOUR® NEXT ONE Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CONTOUR® NEXT ONE Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CONTOUR NEXT ONE Blood Glucose Monitoring System with changes to strip packaging, user guide format, and outer carton configuration
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips or palm for self-testing by people with diabetes at home as an aid in monitoring diabetes control.
